h3_title: Chen Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: When he's defeated, Chen Loong will throw a bit of a tantrum, and you'll find he's not such a bad guy. He also seems to know Xu Dog, and claims only one of his celestial resurrection pills can ease his pains.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chen_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Chen Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Chen Loong' and the sub-subsection 'Chen Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When he's defeated, Chen Loong will throw a bit of a tantrum, and you'll find he's not such a bad guy. He also seems to know Xu Dog, and claims only one of his celestial resurrection pills can ease his pains.
